htmlP1.title: Project #1
htmlP1.paragraph: The following is a recreation of one of the pages from the project bank. This project was made using only HTML and CSS.

htmlP2.title: Project #2
htmlP2.paragraph: A recreation of a landing page from the project bank. This page was built using only CSS and HTML.

htmlP3.title: Project #3
htmlP3.paragraph: The following is a landing page I made for a friend's business. LightStudios focuses on creating content for businesses resulting in more leads via Social Media. This project was made using only HTML and CSS.

clockApp.title: Clock App
clockApp.paragraph: This is a JavaScript-based clock application featuring three functionalities: World Clock, Timer, and Stopwatch.

simon.title: Simon
simon.paragraph: This JavaScript version breathes life into the classic Simon game, conjuring a nostalgic ambiance with its genuine game sounds while displaying your high score to inspire you to strive for improvement.

hangman.title: Hangman
hangman.paragraph: A hangman project implemented in JavaScript, providing an interactive gaming experience where players guess letters to unveil a hidden word, showcasing both coding proficiency and user engagement.

userManager.title: User Manager
userManager.paragraph: Built entirely in JavaScript, the user management platform enables users to register, delete, and edit profiles, alongside secure login and logout functionality based on correct credentials.

screenBuilder.title: Screen Builder
screenBuilder.paragraph: This platform, built entirely with JavaScript, provides a user-friendly interface for creating complete HTML pages effortlessly, offering intuitive features to add content and style elements without requiring coding expertise. Additionally, users can save their creations and load existing files seamlessly, streamlining the webpage development process for both beginners and experienced users alike.

conversionCalculator.title: Conversion Calculator
conversionCalculator.paragraph: This calculator is designed for a forex company to help customers understand their final outcome after factoring in the company's fees and the exchange rate. It enables users to quickly determine the net amount they will receive or pay for currency transactions. By inputting the exchange amount and relevant fees, clients can make informed decisions about their conversions.
